// 1. Generate a GUID (UUID v4) using Postman's built-in utility
// 2. Pass it to a variable (choose one of the options below)
// Option A: Save to Environment Variable (best for temporary use in an environment)
// Option B: Save to Collection Variable (best for use across the whole collection)

body.raw:
{
    "ARMSessionId": "{{session}}",
    "trace": true,
    "validateonly": false,
    "axclient_dateformat": "yyyy-MM-dd",
    "data": [
        {
            "transid": "tst23",
            "action": "edit",
            "keyfield": "recordid",
            "keyvalue": "100000000004654",
            "submitdata": {
                "dc1": {                    
                   "row1": {
                        "axp_recid": "100000000004654",
                        "axrow_action": "edit",
                        "txtfld": "BAD 04A B1",
                        "txtfld2": "BAB 04A AAAAAB",
                        "decnum": "04.00",
                        "wholenum": "0404",
                         "datafld": "2025-12-26",
                        "timefld": "04:04 AM",
                        "timestampfld": "2025-12-26",
                        "dropdown": "Item2",
                        "multifld": "mohan",
                        "richtext": "t t 0404B",
                        "chklist": "Check2,Check3",
                        "chkbox": "T",
                        "radiogrp": "Radio2",
                        "empng": "002"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    ]
}

item.name: AxList  based on ADSNames with Ax UI filters

body.raw:
{
    "ARMSessionId": "{{session}}",
    "action": "view",
    "Project": "pgbase114odbc",
    "ADSNames": [
        "ds_groupby_test"
    ],
    "trace": true,
    "getallrecordscount": false,
    "CachePermissions": false,    
    "pageno": 1,
    "pagesize": 10,
    "keyfield": "username",
    "keyvalue": "ALL",
    "AxClient_dateformat" : "MM/dd/yyyy", //optional
    "select_columns" : ["username","sqlsrc"],
    "aggregations" : {"total_sqlname": "count(*)"},
    "groupby_columns" : ["username","sqlsrc"],
    "sorting": [
        {
            "fldname": "sqlsrc",
            "sort_order": "desc"
        }
    ],
    "filters": [
        {
            "fldname": "sqlname",
            "datatype": "TEXT",
            "value": "test",
            "condition": "NOT EQUALS" //NOT EQUALS //NOT CONTAINS // STARTSWITH // ENDSWITH // CONTAINS // EQUALS
        },   
        {
            "fldname": "app_desc",
            "datatype": "NUMERIC",
            "from": "0",
            "to": "3"
        },
        {
            "fldname": "createdby",
            "datatype": "DROPDOWN",
            "condition": "IN", 
            "value": [
                "admin",
                "mohan",
                "lakshmi"
            ]
        },
        {
            "fldname": "modifiedon",
            "datatype": "DATE",
            "from": "12/31/2021",
            "to": "12/31/2026"
        },
        {
            "fldname": "modifiedon",
            "datatype": "TIMESTAMP",
            "from": "12/31/2021 00:00:00",
            "to": "12/31/2026 23:59:59"
        }
    ]
}
